entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 7.
